notesStmt.note: "Some uncommon observations about vitiated sight. London: printed for J. Taylor, at the Ship in St. Paul's Church-Yard, 1688."; pagination and register are continuous.
With a final errata leaf and two final advertisement leaves.
Attributed to Robert Boyle by Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
